task_text: [Vaccinology][Summarization + Factual-Retrieval] Identify immunogenicity metrics cited in the MDPI paper and summarize what they reveal about vaccine performance.

gold_end_state.summary: MDPI cites neutralizing antibody titers, binding antibody levels, and T-cell response assays as immunogenicity metrics; higher neutralizing titers and robust cellular responses correlate with better protection in trials and inform expectations of vaccine effectiveness.

quiz.question: Which immunogenicity metric is most commonly used as a surrogate for protection?
